titles.title: To amend the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to include Montgomery and Roanoke Counties, Virginia, as part of the Appalachian region.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Amends the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to include Montgomery and Roanoke Counties, Virginia, as part of the Appalachian region.
